x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Employees with toddlers often struggle to manage parental leave, daycare schedules, and related benefits. Missed deadlines, overlapping schedules, or lack of reminders can create stress and impact both work productivity and child care quality.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A ServiceNow app where employees can log toddlers’ daycare schedules, track parental leave, and receive automated reminders for important dates like vaccinations, daycare fees, and school holidays.

  • HR Service Delivery – Track parental leave and child care requests.
  • Service Catalog – Submit leave or schedule requests easily.
  • Notifications – Automated reminders for upcoming events or deadlines.
  • Dashboards – Insights for employees and HR on leave usage and childcare schedules.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • HR Service Delivery module configuration.
  • Service Catalog for leave and childcare requests.
  • Notification and Reminder workflows.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring data privacy and security for employee and child information.
  • Integrating multiple HR policies and daycare schedules.
  • Providing a flexible interface that works for different family needs and locations.
